features: ★ Maximum Power – Allmax AAA Maximum Power Alkaline Batteries are premium grade, high-performance batteries built with EnergyCircle Technology to supply maximum power to your electronic devices.

★ Ultra Long-Lasting – Allmax AAA batteries are considered “ultra long-lasting” and have been independently tested to outperform standard alkaline batteries. This means you can expect Allmax batteries to last longer than competitive brands.
★ Leakproof Design – Allmax AAA batteries are designed to seal in materials and protect electronic devices. This makes Allmax batteries perfect for everyday household and business use.

★ 10-Year Shelf Life – Allmax AAA batteries are always fresh and maintain power for up to 10 years in proper storage. This makes Allmax batteries perfect for long-term storage and emergency preparedness kits.

★ Maximum Performance – Allmax AAA batteries are trusted by families, teachers, schools and businesses around the world for long-lasting performance and reliability. Allmax AAA batteries are compatible with a wide range of electronic devices, including remote controls, flashlights, toys, wireless mice, wireless keyboards, clocks, flameless candles, LED lights, toothbrushes, digital cameras, radios, fire sticks, traffic wands, noise meters, headlamps, blood pressure monitors, golf launch monitors, shooting earmuffs, shavers, CD players, wireless headsets, game consoles, and more!

Customer Questions Are Allmax batteries rechargeable? Allmax batteries labeled "Rechargeable" can be recharged. Standard Allmax alkaline batteries CANNOT be recharged. DO NOT try and recharge standard alkaline batteries as this may lead to battery leakage or explosion. Standard alkaline batteries and specialized NiMH rechargeable batteries are NOT interchangeable. Only Allmax NiMH rechargeable batteries can be recharged. These batteries can be recharged up to 2,000 times with proper usage. Please properly identify batteries before trying to recharge. What is the capacity in mAh of the battery? The battery’s mAh determines how long the battery will last, and performance varies based on the type of electronic device you use. When you use our batteries in a radio, for example, Allmax’s AAA Alkaline batteries have a capacity of 1,370 mAh. This is good. Where can I find the expiration date? You can find the expiration date on the body of the battery or on the box. It is marked with a "Best Before" date. Our Allmax AAA Alkaline battery has a 10-year shelf life, meaning under proper storage conditions you can use it any time before this date. Will the battery fit in my device? They usually do. For example, the height of our AAA Alkaline batteries is 1.74 inches with an outer diameter of 0.40 inches. This conforms to IEC standards. So if the size of your battery compartment is designed to IEC standards, our batteries will fit. How are Allmax batteries packaged? There are 4 Allmax AAA Alkaline batteries tightly wrapped in plastic shrink packs, with 9 shrink packs per package that are well-packed in boxes that are easy to open, easy to stock, reclosable, and impact-resistant, so your batteries are always protected. Can I store batteries in the refrigerator? It is not a good idea to store batteries in the refrigerator. It is best to store batteries in a cool, dry place. We DO NOT recommend storing batteries in the fridge. This does not lengthen battery life. For safety reasons, please keep batteries away from children and from extreme temperatures, hot or cold. Do not freeze batteries, and do not expose batteries to fire. Extreme temperatures may cause batteries to explode or may lead to harmful outcomes. Are batteries affected by temperature? Extreme high or low temperature is not good for batteries. DO NOT use or store batteries at high or low temperature. Low temperature may cause battery discharge capacity to drop, while high temperature may lead to battery leakage. What should I pay attention to during use? Before using your batteries, please remove the film around the battery and check to see whether the anode and the cathode of the battery compartment look normal, without any dirt or rust. Also, do not mix old and new batteries or batteries of different types or brands together. How can I track the status of my order? If you have any questions or concerns about the delivery or status of your order, please contact Amazon through their website or by calling their toll-free number. Together we work to ensure your batteries are delivered on time and they are in perfect condition. What if I receive a broken or defective product? If your box or product is damaged in any way, please contact Amazon. Amazon is responsible for delivering our products, so they will take care of your order. If you need further assistance, please do not hesitate to reach us through Amazon. Our information is easily accessible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Allmax AAA Alkaline Batteries - The Powerhouse in Your Pocket!
reviews.reviewText: The Allmax AAA Maximum Power Alkaline Batteries have truly impressed me with their long-lasting performance and reliability. This bulk pack of 100 AAA batteries is a powerhouse that keeps my devices running smoothly. Here's why I'm absolutely thrilled with this product:Ultra Long-Lasting:These AAA batteries are true to their name - maximum power! They provide an exceptional lifespan, ensuring that I get the most out of my electronic devices. I can rely on them for extended periods of use, whether it's in a TV remote, wireless mouse, or any other gadget.10-Year Shelf Life:The 10-year shelf life is a game-changer. It means I can stock up on these batteries without worrying about them losing their charge while in storage. They're always ready when I need them, even for emergency situations.Leakproof Design:The leakproof design of these batteries is crucial for the safety and longevity of my devices. I've never had to deal with corrosive leaks damaging my electronics since I started using Allmax batteries.Consistent Voltage:The batteries provide a steady 1.5V voltage output throughout their lifespan. This consistency ensures that my devices perform optimally without any unexpected shutdowns due to voltage drops.Versatile Compatibility:These AAA batteries are compatible with a wide range of devices, from remote controls to flashlights, toys, and more. They're a versatile power source that covers all my household needs.Economical Bulk Pack:The bulk pack of 100 batteries offers fantastic value for the price. It's a cost-effective way to ensure that I always have a steady supply of reliable power sources on hand.Trusted Brand:Allmax is a brand I trust. They consistently deliver high-quality batteries that live up to their promises, and these AAA batteries are no exception.In conclusion, the Allmax AAA Maximum Power Alkaline Batteries are a must-have for anyone seeking reliable, long-lasting power for their everyday devices. Their impressive lifespan, leakproof design, and economical bulk packaging make them a top-tier choice for powering everything from remote controls to children's toys. Whether you're a tech enthusiast or simply looking for a dependable battery solution, these AAA batteries deliver on all fronts. I wholeheartedly recommend them; they're the powerhouse you need in your pocket to keep your devices running smoothly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: So far.. they seem as good as name brand batteries. I use them in my makeup mirror and they work well.They came packaged nicely, delivered on time. And.. they are working a long time. I will purchase again.I recommend these batteries .Wislity at s decent price! A winner for sure😄

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These are awesome and some will say well they're just batteries doesn't matter what kind Not True. These last longer than the Duracell batteries we got from the store. I was shocked when the Duracell died out before these. I will give them their props these last long they're way better priced especially for the quality and none have exploded. Not sure if you know but for those of you who have a pre teen or teen in your house that swears sticking batteries in the freezer makes them last longer and "revive" These are your batteries! They're cheaper work longer better quality and don't explode, unless of course you decide to microwave them, Boys a house full of Boys 😔 prayer is needed and appreciated 🙏 These and the AC ones are the only ones we get now.Save yourself your time and your money and part of your sanity and get these batteries (especially if you have kids that like to experiment with everything or try things they saw in videos😔)

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Used for data logging
reviews.reviewText: We use these for work to buy in bulk to support our data loggers that need to operate for weeks or months at a time. The batteries are cheap and last a while even when they're continually in use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Missing batteries, but Great Seller fixed!
reviews.reviewText: Package came already opened and retaped shut with 2 batteries taken out. Probably a factory worker needing batteries for a radio or something. Which is why only 3 stars, usually the products aren't tampered with before shipping.Edit: update seller has rectified the situation by sending brand new untampered pack of batteries. Work great and now I shouldn't run out for a while. Thanks!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Some of the batteries were defective
reviews.reviewText: Update:the seller reached out and refunded me my money. While I appreciate that they care enough to monitor their reviews and make it right, it would still be better if you could count on a working product when you order it. I upped my rating from 1 to 3 stars because they took care of their mistake.I won’t buy these again. I got them so we would have working batteries Christmas morning. Some of them didn’t work. I can’t return them because we needed to use the ones that weren’t defective. Disappointing! I gave them 1 star because all of the batteries should work.

I bought the Allman AAA batteries.Great value for the money.I am only 3 weeks in but so far my flashlights are brighter than my other batteries.Living in Northern Ontario I need good batteries and so far so good.
